title: Cant connect to chat in lobby
body:
Kinda annoying not being able to talk about picks or see any of their writings pregame.
Here is proof: http://puu.sh/sOdqM/0ab50119ca.jpg
-BTw im using the new client. and to list other bugs with it.
-Not able to pick 1/5 in mastry tree, only 5/5 everytime.
-Also when entering game i get 1 unable to connect to server which i need to press Cancel, then i reconnect, and everything is fine.
-I think this happend after i played on Japanese server which caused me to download 24. patch before it released in my region.
- i also noticed that this now also applies to postgame window.

replies.body:
Are you able to use chat on the legacy client?  I have a feeling that you won't be able to if your network is failing to connect to the chat servers:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

This as well as the mastery issue is feedback that should certainly be sent to the client devs.  Be sure to share your findings on the[ client discussion](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) boards.  Thanks for testing!

I can chat normally and ingame, just not in lobby.
latest emergency patch fixed it
